carraway wins!
Estates, Hamlets, and Duchies are all gone.

cards in supply: Coppersmith, Envoy, Farming Village, Feast, Hamlet, Laboratory, Mandarin, Noble Brigand, Remake, and Wharf

----------------------

#1 carraway: 45 points (6 Provinces, 6 Estates, and a Duchy); 22 turns
          opening: Hamlet / Wharf
          [33 cards] 4 Laboratories, 3 Hamlets, 1 Mandarin, 1 Remake, 1 Wharf, 4 Coppers, 5 Silvers, 1 Gold, 6 Estates, 1 Duchy, 6 Provinces

#2 Dad Frog: 40 points (10 Duchies, a Province, and 4 Estates); 22 turns
          opening: Feast / Silver
          [33 cards] 2 Laboratories, 1 Hamlet, 1 Remake, 9 Coppers, 5 Silvers, 4 Estates, 10 Duchies, 1 Province

#3 Lanaro: 34 points (4 Provinces, 7 Estates, and a Duchy); 22 turns
        opening: Silver / Envoy
        [39 cards] 6 Hamlets, 3 Envoys, 2 Laboratories, 1 Farming Village, 1 Wharf, 7 Coppers, 4 Silvers, 3 Golds, 7 Estates, 1 Duchy, 4 Provinces

----------------------

trash: 5 Feasts, a Remake, 3 Coppers, and 4 Estates


Game log

Turn order is Dad Frog, Lanaro, and then carraway.

The 13 chosen cards are Ambassador, Chancellor, Coppersmith, Envoy, Familiar, Farming Village, Feast, Hamlet, Laboratory, Mandarin, Noble Brigand, Remake, and Wharf.
Dad Frog vetoes Familiar.
Lanaro vetoes Ambassador.
carraway vetoes Chancellor.


(Dad Frog's first hand: 4 Coppers and an Estate.)
(Lanaro's first hand: 3 Coppers and 2 Estates.)
(carraway's first hand: 2 Coppers and 3 Estates.)


— Dad Frog's turn 1 —
Dad Frog plays 4 Coppers.
Dad Frog buys a Feast.
(Dad Frog draws: 3 Coppers and 2 Estates.)
   

   — Lanaro's turn 1 —
   Lanaro plays 3 Coppers.
   Lanaro buys a Silver.
   (Lanaro draws: 4 Coppers and an Estate.)
      

      — carraway's turn 1 —
      carraway plays 2 Coppers.
      carraway buys a Hamlet.
      (carraway draws: 5 Coppers.)

Dad Frog plays 3 Coppers.
Dad Frog buys a Silver.
(Dad Frog reshuffles.)
(Dad Frog draws: 3 Coppers and 2 Estates.)

   Lanaro buys an Envoy.

Estates, Hamlets, and Duchies are all gone.
carraway wins!
